personalInfo.education: University of Maryland, HAAC Community College (2005)

tourBios.carHigh: Had never played on the Nationwide Tour or PGA TOUR prior to the start of the 2010 season. 2010: Made three starts. Qualified for the U.S. Open at Pebble Beach. Also played in the Melwood Prince George's County Open and the Mexico Open Bicentenary. Member of the Hooters Tour, where he earned 2007 Rookie of the Year honors. Won two events on that Tour, including the 2007 Loma Linda event and the 2009 Rock Barn event. Played on the eGolf Tour in 2009. Ran off six consecutive top-four finishes and ended the season No. 6 on the money list.
tourBios.personal: His sister, Lara, served as captain of the University of Maryland golf team...Cites winning his first professional event on the Hooters Tour on Father's Day as his biggest thrill in golf. Course he'd most like to play is Pine Valley in New Jersey. Favorite course is Indian Wells CC's Hope Course...Never travels without his computer. Favorite college team is the Arizona Wildcat basketball team. Favorite professional team is the Philadelphia Phillies...Favorite TV show is "SportsCenter" and favorite movie is "Carlito's Way." Enjoys listening to Howard Stern and watching Chris Paul play basketball. Favorite food is steak...Lists Palm Springs, CA, Park City, UT, and Miami's South Beach area among his favorite vacation spots...Is an avid NBA fan and one day dreams of having courtside seats at an NBA Finals game. Other bucket list items include completing a marathon and traveling the world.
